title: How to fix the firewall error after champion select.
body: I realize that this is a bug that has been around for along time and it has just recently happened to me. I have tried a lot of methods online but none have worked. Please help I just want to get back to the rift. Thank you in advance.

replies.body:
The only way this stopped happening to me was running LoL as an admin.  

I haven't run the game without doing so and it's working fine for me, but, I can't say for other people.
When it happens, disabling the firewall in my experience made no difference.
I'm no computer tech, but possibly turn your fire wall off? or have it make exceptions if it can? Possibly try to patch your lol?
